entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Blowing snow at times. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
